## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3bdf69166b497f7cd30a51ffff97b600796cbf77f8a34ead71e7ed700f40dfc7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'samsungads-publisher-portal-authorizer' @ 99999.999.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
